column2: This is my carnaval aye aye aye ha. (Mr. Worldwide). This is my carnaval aye aye aye ha. (Muito sexy Claudia Leitte). Shake it and drop it shake it and drop it. (That's right). I miss the arms that used to hold me. The tender way we used to kiss. I miss the way that you touch me. I miss the sweet taste of your lips. I was a fool to ever leave you. You were a fool to let me go. Oh it's so lonesome, lonesome here with out you. Oh how I miss you so. It hurt... it hurt... it hurt so bad. You were the best man I ever had. Why was I so blind to see?. Now the biggest fool is me. I miss the arms that used to hold me. The tender way we used to kiss. Ooo... yes... ooo... I miss the way that you touch me. I miss the sweet taste of your lips. It hurt... it hurt... it hurt so bad. 'Cause ooo you were the best man I ever, ever, ever had. Why was I so blind to see. And now the biggest fool is me. Oh Oh what a fool I was darlin'... yes.... And oh you were a fool to let... let me go... why did you let me go?. It's so lonesome here with out you. Oh how I miss you so. Oh Oh now yes. Don't do it, don't do it, don't do it oh lord no!. I miss you oh yeah!. Come back Oh! come back to me, yes. Oh how I miss you. Oh I miss you so. Oh Oh Lordy, Lordy, Lordy Oooo......... Don't do it, Oh! Come on baby Come back to me. Oh how I miss you so. How I miss you so. Oh,oh,oh,ooooo....Lord now. Oh I miss you baby

Are you ready to dance?. To make your body crazy. Then let me show you how it's done brazilian way. Are you ready to dance?. To make your body crazy. Then let me show you how it's done brazilian way. So let your body lose and do the lazy groove. (Lazy groove, lazy groove). Move your arms around like you've got nothing to lose. (Lazy groove, lazy groove). So let your body lose and do the lazy groove. (Lazy groove, lazy groove). Move your arms around like you've got nothing to lose. (Lazy groove, lazy groove). Get down, boy. Get down, boy. Get down, boy. Get down, boy. Get down, boy. Now get ready to get up!. Get up. Get up. Get up. Get up. Get up. Shake your body there that I'll bounce from here. That's how you dance. That's how you move. Just fool around. Nothing to prove. This groove is catchy. It's all over the muse. Everybody talk about it. So it's no time for you. To surrender to brazilian beat. And do the lazy groove. So let your body lose and do the lazy groove. (Lazy groove). Move your arms around like you've got nothing to lose. So let your body lose and do the lazy groove. (Lazy groove). Move your arms around like you've got nothing to lose. Move your body like no one is looking at you. Shake your body, feel the lazy groove. Move your arms around like you've got nothing to lose. Shake your body and come to do the lazy groove

We're going too fast. But I don't care about that. I'm not the kind of girl. You'd use to. Don't need to act cool. I know you're old school. Just be yourself and let me show you. I don't care. I'll take the reigns and you'll know what to do. It's all there. So there's nothing left to lose. You don't have to hold my hand. You don't need to be my friend. If you want to be the man. Take your time. But send that shiver down my spine. Ho ho ho, Ho ho ho ho. Don't act politely. Don't worry about me. I want a love that's more exciting. Don't have to be Cool. I just wanna feel you. Step through my eyes when you're beside me. I don't care. I'll take the reigns and you'll know what to do. It's all there. So there's nothing left to lose. You don't have to hold my hand. I don't need that kind of love. You don't need to be my friend. Make love is just enough. If you want to be the man. You gotta turn my world around. Take your time. But send a shiver down my spine. Forget the rings. I don't need those things. Throw out all the rules. Don't complicate it. I'll demonstrate it. It's not about you. You don't have to hold my hand. You don't need to be my friend. If you want to be the man. Take your time. Or send a shiver down my spine

I'm lying alone on the floor. With a feather I found in my hand. I wanna believe its from you. But I just dont think that I can. If theres a God then you'd still be here. And a heaven then why am I in hell. I'm lost and I'm lookin for signs. And maybe I'm just fooling myself. But I swear down my spine I'm getting shivers. Like we kissed for the very first time. Tho the tears are streaming down like rivers. I know I asked you to give me a sign. I'm not scared tho my body starts shakin. I can almost feel you drying my eyes. And even tho my heart is breaking. I know you love me from the other side. Now I see the signs, I see the signs. Keep findin myself on the street. Starin at you from behind. Then I reach out to turn you around. But I'm lookin in a strangers eyes. If theres a God then you'd still be here. Or a heaven then why am I in hell. And tt feels like you just walked thru me. Cos you touch me like no one else. And I swear down my spine I'm getting shivers. Like we kissed for the very first time. Tho the tears are streaming down like rivers. I know I asked you to give me a sign. I'm not scared tho my body starts shakin. I can almost feel you drying my eyes. And even tho my heart is breaking. I know you love me from the other side. Now I see the signs. I see the signs (4x). I'm lying alone on the floor. With a feather I found in my hand. I wanna believe its from you. But I just dont think that I can. And I swear down my spine I'm getting shivers. Like we kissed for the very first time. Tho the tears are streaming down like rivers. I know I asked you to give me a sign. I'm not scared tho my body starts shakin. I can almost feel you drying my eyes. And even tho my heart is breaking. I know you love me from the other side. Now I see the signs,. I see the signs (4x)

Lying in my bed I hear the clock tick. And think of you. caught up in circles. confusion Is nothing new. Flashback--warm nights. Almost left behind. Suitcase of memories. Time after. Sometimes you picture me. I'm walking too far ahead. You're calling to me, I can't hear. What you've said. Then you say--go slow. I fall behind. The second hand unwinds. If you're lost you can look--and you will find me. Time after time. If you fall I will catch you--I'll be waiting. Time after time. If you're lost you can look--and you will find me. Time after time. If you fall I will catch you--I'll be waiting. Time after time. After my picture fades and darkness has. Turned to gray. Watching through windows--you're wondering. If I'm OK. Secrets stolen from deep inside. The drum beats out of time. If you're lost you can look--and you will find me. Time after time. If you fall I will catch you--I'll be waiting. Time after time. You said go slow. I fall behind. The second hand unwinds. If you're lost you can look--and you will find me. Time after time. If you fall I will catch you--I'll be waiting. Time after time. If you're lost you can look--and you will find me. Time after time. If you fall I will catch you--I'll be waiting. Time after time. Time after time x 7

Put your flags up in the sky (put them in the sky). (Joga ela pro alto). And wave them side to side (side to side) (lado a lado). Show the world where you're from.
